org.apache.giraph.metrics

类 GiraphMetricsRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.metrics.GiraphMetricsRegistry
  • 直接已知子类:
    SuperstepMetricsRegistry

    public class GiraphMetricsRegistry
extends Object
    A holder for MetricsRegistry together with a JmxReporter.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • GiraphMetricsRegistry

        protected GiraphMetricsRegistry(com.yammer.metrics.core.MetricsRegistry registry,
                     com.yammer.metrics.reporting.JmxReporter reporter,
                     String groupName,
                     String type)
        Constructor
        参数:
        registry - MetricsRegistry to use
        reporter - JmxReporter to use
        groupName - String grouping for metrics
        type - String type name for metrics

    • 方法详细资料

      • createFake

        public static GiraphMetricsRegistry createFake()
        Create no-op empty registry that makes no-op metrics.
        返回:
        fake registry that makes no-op metrics

      • createWithOptional

        public static GiraphMetricsRegistry createWithOptional(String groupName,
                                       String type)
        Create registry with group to use for metrics.
        参数:
        groupName - String group to use for metrics.
        type - String type to use for metrics.
        返回:
        new metrics registry

      • create

        public static GiraphMetricsRegistry create(GiraphConfiguration conf,
                           String groupName,
                           String type)
        Create registry with Hadoop Configuration and group to use for metrics. Checks the configuration object for whether the optional metrics are enabled, and optionally creates those.
        参数:
        conf - Hadoop Configuration to use.
        groupName - String group to use for metrics.
        type - String type to use for metrics.
        返回:
        new metrics registry

      • getAll

        public Map<com.yammer.metrics.core.MetricName,com.yammer.metrics.core.Metric> getAll()
        Get map of all metrics.
        返回:
        Map of all metrics held.

      • getGroupName

        public String getGroupName()
        Get group name used for metrics.
        返回:
        String group name.

      • setGroupName

        protected void setGroupName(String groupName)
        Set group name used by this MetricsRegistry. Used for incrementing superstep number to create a new hierarchy of metrics per superstep.
        参数:
        groupName - String group name to use.

      • getType

        public String getType()
        Get type used for new metrics created
        返回:
        String type to use for metrics

      • setType

        public void setType(String type)
        Set type to use for new metrics
        参数:
        type - String type to use

      • printToStream

        public void printToStream(PrintStream out)
        Dump all the metrics to the PrintStream provided.
        参数:
        out - PrintStream to write metrics to.

      • getInternalRegistry

        protected com.yammer.metrics.core.MetricsRegistry getInternalRegistry()
        Get internal MetricsRegistry used.
        返回:
        MetricsRegistry being used.

      • getCounter

        public com.yammer.metrics.core.Counter getCounter(String name)
        Creates a new Counter and registers it under the given group and name.
        参数:
        name - the name of the metric
        返回:
        a new Counter

      • getGauge

        public <T> com.yammer.metrics.core.Gauge<T> getGauge(String name,
                                            com.yammer.metrics.core.Gauge<T> metric)
        Given a new Gauge, registers it under the given group and name.
        类型参数:
        T - the type of the value returned by the metric
        参数:
        name - the name of the metric
        metric - the metric
        返回:
        metric

      • getMeter

        public com.yammer.metrics.core.Meter getMeter(MeterDesc meterDesc)
        Creates a new Meter and registers it under the given group and name.
        参数:
        meterDesc - description of meter
        返回:
        new Meter

      • getMeter

        public com.yammer.metrics.core.Meter getMeter(String name,
                                     String eventType,
                                     TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Creates a new Meter and registers it under the given group and name.
        参数:
        name - the name of the metric
        eventType - the plural name of the type of events the meter is measuring (e.g., "requests")
        timeUnit - the rate unit of the new meter
        返回:
        a new Meter

      • getTimer

        public com.yammer.metrics.core.Timer getTimer(TimerDesc timerDesc)
        Create a new Timer from the description and registers it under the given group and name.
        参数:
        timerDesc - TimerDesc describing the timer
        返回:
        new Timer

      • getTimer

        public com.yammer.metrics.core.Timer getTimer(String name,
                                     TimeUnit durationUnit,
                                     TimeUnit rateUnit)
        Creates a new Timer and registers it under the given group and name.
        参数:
        name - the name of the metric
        durationUnit - the duration scale unit of the new timer
        rateUnit - the rate scale unit of the new timer
        返回:
        a new Timer

      • getExistingGauge

        public <T> com.yammer.metrics.core.Gauge<T> getExistingGauge(String name)
        Get a Gauge that is already present in the MetricsRegistry
        类型参数:
        T - value type Gauge returns
        参数:
        name - String name of Gauge
        返回:
        Gauge from MetricsRegistry

      • makeMetricName

        protected com.yammer.metrics.core.MetricName makeMetricName(String name)
        Create a MetricName using the job ID, group, and name.
        参数:
        name - String name given to metric
        返回:
        MetricName for use with MetricsRegistry
